item.title: MPW
item.description: score:213 Chances: In the closing of the recent trading day, Medical Properties (MPW) stood at $4.19, denoting a +0.24% change from the preceding trading day. Medical Properties Trust is making progress on its plan to get back on solid ground. The hospital-focused REIT finally had some good news.
